answers.answer: It is quite normal not to be able to get an erection without ejaculate after doing it once.It takes time for the prostate to make the fluid again.Women can have multiple orgasms one after another, but this is not the case for a man.Thinking about doing it will also add more stress on you to achieve, and that too can dampen your desires.  Being tired, having too much alcohol, some medications can also have an effect on your performance.Diabetes can cause nerve damage where loss of sensations can be lost.If you are concerned, your doctor can check your blood for a hormone imbalance and also if you have diabetes.

And now with out a condom when iI pull out using that method to try & stimulate her I don't feel the urge to ***,.  just start ejaculating. this is new .  I am good at oral, i have an average size 5"-6". title: what''s my issue?  premature eaculation loss of sensitivity with & without a condom.
